select product_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product (pseq, name, kind, content, img, place, hash, thema, spot, pick) values (#{pseq}, #{name}, #{kind}, #{content}, #{img}, #{place}, #{hash}, #{thema}, #{spot}, #{pick, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from product order by pseq
mapper.update: update product set name=#{name}, kind=#{kind}, content=#{content}, img=#{img}, place=#{place}, hash=#{hash} where pseq=#{pseq}
mapper.insert: insert into product_detail (pcode, pseq, kind, name, content, price1, price2, price3, hash, guide, startdate, enddate, airline, rentent, rentcar, hgrade, hotel, count) values (#{pcode}, #{pseq}, #{kind}, #{name}, #{content}, #{price1}, #{price2}, #{price3}, #{hash}, #{guide}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{airline}, #{rentent}, #{rentcar}, #{hgrade}, #{hotel}, #{count})
mapper.select: select * from product_detail where pseq=#{pseq} order by pseq,pcode
mapper.update: update product_detail set kind=#{kind}, name=#{name}, content=#{content}, price1=#{price1}, price2=#{price2}, price3=#{price3}, hash=#{hash}, guide=#{guide}, startdate=#{startdate}, enddate=#{enddate}, airline=#{airline}, rentent=#{rentent}, rentcar=#{rentcar}, hgrade=#{hgrade}, hotel=#{hotel}, count=#{count} where pcode=#{pcode}
mapper.select: select (d.enddate-d.startdate+1) as period, p.pseq, p.name, p.kind, p.content, p.img, p.place, p.hash, p.thema, p.spot, p.pick, d.pcode, d.pseq dpseq, d.kind dkind, d.name dname, d.content dcontent, d.price1, d.price2, d.price3, d.hash, d.guide, d.startdate, d.enddate, d.airline, d.rentent, d.rentcar, d.hgrade, d.hotel, d.count from product p, product_detail d where p.pseq=d.pseq and d.price2 = (select min(d.price2) from product p, product_detail d where p.pseq=d.pseq and p.place='제주도') order by pseq
